changeSet.author: glasir
changeSet.sql:
-- @version $Id: //product/DSS/version/10.1.1/templates/DSS/sql/dss_mappers.xml#1 $$Change: 690623 $
create table dss_audit_trail ( id varchar2(32) not null, timestamp date null, label varchar2(255) null, profileid varchar2(25) null, segmentName varchar2(254) null, processName varchar2(254) null, sessionid varchar2(100) null, parentsessionid varchar2(100) null);
